K10D0314_H0318:252a-1: ta mo pa na mu kha n'a ma sv'ah'a /
K10D0314_H0318:252a-3: mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo /
K10D0314_H0318:252a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0314_H0318:252a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0314_H0318:252a-7: bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na /
K10D0314_H0318:252a-8: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K10D0314_H0318:252a-9: de nas de'i tshe ngam grog gsum po zhes bya
K10D0314_H0318:252a-10: ba'i ljongs kyi skye bo dag gi nang nas ri
K10D0314_H0318:252a-12: bram ze la ba can zhes bya ba spun bu
K10D0314_H0318:252a-13: 'dod pa'i phyir bram ze rnga leb la dka' thub
K10D0314_H0318:252a-14: byed de / lha stong phrag brgya la bu slong
K10D0314_H0318:252a-15: zhing gsol ba 'debs pa dang la ba can la
K10D0314_H0318:252b-0: bu btsas pa ni ming rab mthong zhes btags @252b
K10D0314_H0318:252b-1: so; ;nu bo la btsas pa ni dga' bo zhes
K10D0314_H0318:252b-2: byed de / btags so // gang gi nyin mo
K10D0314_H0318:252b-3: rab mthong btsas pa de'i nyin mo bram ze lnga
K10D0314_H0318:252b-4: brgya la bu lnga brgya btsas te /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-5: de dag rim bzhin du bu cher skyes pa dang;
K10D0314_H0318:252b-6: rab mthong la sogs pa lnga brgya lhan cig tu
K10D0314_H0318:252b-7: rig pa dag slob pa na /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-8: rab mthong la sogs pa rig pa'i gnas thams cad
K10D0314_H0318:252b-9: kyi pha rol tu son cing thams cad rdzogs par
K10D0314_H0318:252b-10: yang dag par byang bar gyur la /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-11: bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag pa las byung ba'i
K10D0314_H0318:252b-12: spyod pa mtshungs pa med pa stong phrag brgya snyed
K10D0314_H0318:252b-13: thob ste / dbang byed pa gang gi dus su
K10D0314_H0318:252b-14: bram ze ma na pa gcig yul dbus nas 'ongs
K10D0314_H0318:252b-15: te phyin nas phrad pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-16: de la gsong por smras te gtam dag kyang byas
K10D0314_H0318:252b-17: nas nges par gang nas 'ongs pa yin zhes dris
K10D0314_H0318:252b-19: yul dbus nas 'ongs pa yin te /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-20: de'ang grong khyer chen po drug go /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-21: de'i nang dag na tshad ma drug la mkhas shing
K10D0314_H0318:252b-22: ltas kyi bya ba drug la thogs pa med par
K10D0314_H0318:252b-23: brjod nus pa'i ston bco brgyad yod de /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-24: de na chu klung yang 'bab bo //
K10D0314_H0318:252b-25: de ma yin pa bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de na'o zhes byas pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-29: rab 'thong gis sgra de thos pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-31: rab tu dga' ste der 'gro'o snyam nas /
K10D0314_H0318:252b-32: pha'i gan du song ste phyin nas /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-0: @253a *// yab; bdag ni yul dbus su mchi'o //
K10D0314_H0318:253a-1: de nas mu steg pa dag las rgyal bar bgyi'o //
K10D0314_H0318:253a-2: mkhas par 'grangs pa dag dang nges par lhan cig smra bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-4: de nas bsod nams chen po sbyin pas dbang phyug chen po dang ldan pa /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-5: sems can thams cad la gtong pa chen po can
K10D0314_H0318:253a-6: de lha dag gis bsrungs pa zhig pas lha dag
K10D0314_H0318:253a-7: nye bar 'ong zhing sngon du 'gro ste /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-8: rab mthong chen po la mchod pa byos shig dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-9: phan yon mang po dag gi 'bras bu chen po
K10D0314_H0318:253a-10: 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra sgrogs shing song ba
K10D0314_H0318:253a-12: mis mchod pa byas shing mnyan yod du phyin to //
K10D0314_H0318:253a-13: de nas lam gyis dub pa rta bstis te bcom
K10D0314_H0318:253a-14: ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
K10D0314_H0318:253a-15: / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10D0314_H0318:253a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan pa mdzad de /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-17: de'i 'khor lnga brgya po dag lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa bshig bcom ste /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-18: bden pa mthong ste de nyid du rab tu byung /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-19: dge slong gi dngos po bzung ste /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-20: nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom nas dgra bcom pa mngon du byas te /
K10D0314_H0318:253a-21: dga' bo ni ma gtogs so //
K10D0314_H0318:253a-22: skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang chos khong du chud do //
K10D0314_H0318:253b-0: ston pa chen @253b po rab mthong blta ba'i phyir
K10D0314_H0318:253b-1: lha la sogs pa dag kyang 'ongs te der phyin
K10D0314_H0318:253b-2: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-4: dge slong rab mthong 'di ni nga'i dge slong dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-5: dge slong dag gi nyan thos dag la ji ltar lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-7: de dag gi nang na lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-8: mis mchod par bya ba'i mchog ni dge slong rab
K10D0314_H0318:253b-9: mthong yin no; ;zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
K10D0314_H0318:253b-10: to // de nas dus de nyid du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-11: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-12: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-14: grul bum gyi sde dpon chen po la sogs pa rang rang gi gnas nas song ste /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-15: tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-16: phyogs gcig tu 'khod de mngon du phyogs /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-17: thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0314_H0318:253b-18: kye; btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-19: sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i gnas /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs gnas /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-21: 'dod chags dang bral ba dag gis gnas par bya ba drang srong gi gnas su gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:253b-22: de kho na nyid nges par mkhyen nas 'das pa'i
K10D0314_H0318:253b-23: bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na yang dag par
K10D0314_H0318:254a-0: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs @254a *//
K10D0314_H0318:254a-1: zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0314_H0318:254a-2: de'i tshe dge slong gsal ba zhes bya ba lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:254a-3: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de'i gnas kyang 'di lags te /
K10D0314_H0318:254a-4: yul dbus las byang phyogs kyis mtshams kyi ri dung
K10D0314_H0318:254a-5: gi lte ba zhes bya ba ni ri de la
K10D0314_H0318:254a-6: rtsva rigs dung gi lte ba 'dra ba skye bas
K10D0314_H0318:254a-7: dung gi lte ba'i ri zhes bya bar btags par
K10D0314_H0318:254a-8: gyur / ri de dang nye ba na nags zhig
K10D0314_H0318:254a-9: na klu mo ae ni zhes bya ba gnas pas
K10D0314_H0318:254a-10: aee ni'i nags zhes bya bar btags par 'gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254a-11: de na phug cig yod pa dang nye bar shing
K10D0314_H0318:254a-12: pa ti li zhes bya ba skye bas pa ti'i
K10D0314_H0318:254a-13: phug ces btags par gyur pa de nyid du bcom
K10D0314_H0318:254a-14: ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
K10D0314_H0318:254a-16: 'khor dgra bcom pa brgyad khri dang gshegs shing thabs gcig tu bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254a-17: dge slong gsal ba'ang de nyid na'o //
K10D0314_H0318:254a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang rim pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das /
K10D0314_H0318:254a-19: bstan pa nub nas rang sangs rgyas bdun khri dag
K10D0314_H0318:254a-20: mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa dag mnyam
K10D0314_H0318:254a-21: du byung ste gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254a-22: rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das
K10D0314_H0318:254a-23: nas drang srong drug khri mngon par shes pa lnga
K10D0314_H0318:254a-24: dang ldan pa dag kyang de nyid du gnas par
K10D0314_H0318:254a-25: gyur to // btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-0: @254b de nas yang bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig
K10D0314_H0318:254b-1: na bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
K10D0314_H0318:254b-2: rgyas gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
K10D0314_H0318:254b-3: byung ste / de'i dge slong rab gsal zhes bya ba lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-4: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'ang de nyid na'o //
K10D0314_H0318:254b-5: mtshams kyi ri de nyid la rtsva'i rigs ro hi
K10D0314_H0318:254b-6: t'i zhes bya ba skye bas ro hi t'i ri
K10D0314_H0318:254b-7: zhes bya bar btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-8: klu mo gos med ces bya ba gnas pas gos med kyi nags zhes bya bar btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-9: shing shir sha skye bas shing shir sha'i phug ces btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-10: yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas gtsug tor can 'khor
K10D0314_H0318:254b-11: dgra bcom pa bdun khri dang yang der gshegs shing
K10D0314_H0318:254b-12: thabs gcig tu bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-13: de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-14: bstan pa nub nas rang sangs rgyas drug khri'ang der gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-15: rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das
K10D0314_H0318:254b-16: nas drang srong lnga khri'ang mngon par shes pa lnga
K10D0314_H0318:254b-17: dang ldan pa de 'di nyid na gnas par gyur
K10D0314_H0318:254b-18: to // btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-19: de nas yang bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig na
K10D0314_H0318:254b-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob
K10D0314_H0318:254b-21: ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-22: de'i dge slong chos gsal zhes bya ba lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:254b-23: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'ang de nyid na'o //
K10D0314_H0318:255a-0: mtshams kyi ri de la rtsva'i rigs @255a *//
K10D0314_H0318:255a-1: bha sa bha zhes bya ba skye bas bha sa bha'i ri zhes btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-2: klu mo brag ces bya ba gnas pas brag gi nags zhes btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-3: shing aa shvad tha skye bas aa shvad tha'i phug ces btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob
K10D0314_H0318:255a-5: 'khor dgra bcom pa drug khri dang de nyid du
K10D0314_H0318:255a-6: gshegs shing thabs gcig tu bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-8: bstan pa nub nas rang sangs rgyas lnga khri'ang gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-9: rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das
K10D0314_H0318:255a-10: nas drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan
K10D0314_H0318:255a-11: pa bzhi khri'ang gnas par gyur to //
K10D0314_H0318:255a-12: 'di ni btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-13: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-15: de'i dge slong chos ldan zhes bya ba lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-16: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'ang de nyid na'o //
K10D0314_H0318:255a-17: mtshams kyi ri'i rtsva'i rigs koo shi ka zhes bya
K10D0314_H0318:255a-18: ba skye bas koo shi ka'i ri zhes btags par
K10D0314_H0318:255a-19: gyur / sprin ces bya ba'i klu mo gcig gnas pas sprin gyi nags zhes btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255a-20: shing au dum w'a ra skye bas au dum w'a ra'i phug ces btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @255b sangs rgyas log par
K10D0314_H0318:255b-1: dad sel 'khor gyi dgra bcom pa lnga khri dang
K10D0314_H0318:255b-2: thabs gcig tu gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-3: de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das nas mngon par
K10D0314_H0318:255b-4: shes pa lnga dang ldan pa drang srong sum khri'ang
K10D0314_H0318:255b-5: de na gnas par gyur to //
K10D0314_H0318:255b-6: 'di ni btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-7: sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la
K10D0314_H0318:255b-8: skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na yang
K10D0314_H0318:255b-9: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya
K10D0314_H0318:255b-11: de'i dge slong chos 'phags zhes bya ba lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-12: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'ang de nyid na'o //
K10D0314_H0318:255b-13: mtshams kyi ri de la rtsva'i rigs kha dog ljang
K10D0314_H0318:255b-14: lo can zhes bya ba skye bas kha dog ljang
K10D0314_H0318:255b-15: lo ri zhes btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-16: thig le zhes bya ba'i klu mo gnas pas thig le'i nags zhes btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-17: shing ka pi ta skye bas ka pi ta'i phug ces btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub 'khor
K10D0314_H0318:255b-19: dgra bcom pa bzhi khri dang gshegs shing thabs gcig
K10D0314_H0318:255b-21: de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-22: bstan pa nub nas rang sangs rgyas sum khri'ang gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:255b-23: rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das
K10D0314_H0318:255b-24: nas mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa drang
K10D0314_H0318:255b-25: srong nyi khri'ang de nyid na gnas par gyur to
K10D0314_H0318:255b-26: // 'di ni btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-1: ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i
K10D0314_H0318:256a-2: tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par
K10D0314_H0318:256a-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig
K10D0314_H0318:256a-5: de'i dge slong she do ka zhes bya ba lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-6: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'ang de nyid na'o //
K10D0314_H0318:256a-7: mtshams kyi ri la rtsva'i rigs zla ba zhes bya
K10D0314_H0318:256a-8: ba skye bas zla ba'i ri zhes btags par gyur
K10D0314_H0318:256a-9: / klu mo rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnas pas rgyal ba'i nags zhes bya bar btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-10: shing dzambu zhes bya ba skye bas dzambu'i phug ces btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor
K10D0314_H0318:256a-12: gyi dgra bcom pa nyi khri dang gshegs shing thabs
K10D0314_H0318:256a-14: de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-15: bstan pa nub nas rang sangs rgyas khri lnga stong gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-16: rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das
K10D0314_H0318:256a-17: nas mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa drang
K10D0314_H0318:256a-18: srong khri gnas par gyur to //
K10D0314_H0318:256a-19: 'di ni btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-20: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe
K10D0314_H0318:256a-21: lo brgya thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0314_H0318:256a-22: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa 'jig rten du byung ste
K10D0314_H0318:256a-23: / 'phags pa rab mthong chen po khyod lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256a-24: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'ang 'di nyid na'o //
K10D0314_H0318:256b-0: mtshams kyi ri la rtsva'i rigs au shi @256b sha skye bas au shi'i ri zhes btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-1: klu mo ta ma zhes bya ba gnas pas ta ma'i nags tshal zhes btags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-2: shing aa mra skye bas aa mra'i phug ces da ltar btags pa yin te /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-3: btsun pa rab mthong chen po /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-4: au shi sha'i ri brag 'di nyid du thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzhugs pa ni legs so //
K10D0314_H0318:256b-5: de nas yang tshangs pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-6: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-7: 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis gnas brtan chen po'i
K10D0314_H0318:256b-8: rkang pa la phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar ba
K10D0314_H0318:256b-9: byas nas rab tu gus pas 'di skad ces smras
K10D0314_H0318:256b-11: nags 'di ni gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i gnas yin te /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-12: bdag cag kyang nye gnas bgyid la gzhan dag kyang gzung du gsol /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-13: de ni snyan par grags shing legs te chu ni
K10D0314_H0318:256b-14: gzigs par dbyung bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba btab
K10D0314_H0318:256b-16: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon brgyad po 'di dag ste /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-17: singga la zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-18: chos skyong zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-19: don grub ces bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-20: gzhan las rgyal zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-21: glang rna zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-22: dbyig rna ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:256b-24: chos 'phags zhes bya bas kyang gnas brtan chen po'i
K10D0314_H0318:256b-25: rkang pa la phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar nas
K10D0314_H0318:256b-26: rab tu gus pas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0314_H0318:257a-0: nags de ni gshegs shing bzhugs @257a *//

K10D0314_H0318:257a-6: gnod sbyin ma chen mo brgyad 'di dag ste /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-7: aa shi di zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-8: bu mang she zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-11: drag mo zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-12: gtum mo zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-13: mdung thung 'dzin ces bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-14: bar snang ma zhes bya bas kyang gnas brtan chen

K10D0314_H0318:257a-16: ba byas nas rab tu gus pas 'di skad ces
K10D0314_H0318:257a-17: smras so // thugs brtse ba can /

K10D0314_H0318:257a-19: bdag cag kyang nye gnas bgyid la gzhan dag kyang
K10D0314_H0318:257a-20: gzung du gsol / de ni snyan par grags shing
K10D0314_H0318:257a-21: legs te chu ni gzigs par dbyung bar 'tshal lo
K10D0314_H0318:257a-25: klu chen po brgyad po 'di dag ste /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-26: ser skya zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-27: dri ma zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-28: chu ldan zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-29: drag shul zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-30: lha'i bang rim zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-31: bum pa'i bang rim zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-32: nye ba'i klu zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257a-33: ao da su ta zhes bya bas kyang gnas brtan chen po'i rkang pa la phyag btsal te /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-0: @257b thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rab tu gus pas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0314_H0318:257b-2: nags de ni gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i gnas yin te /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-3: bdag cag kyang nye gnas bgyid la gzhan dag kyang gzung du gsol /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-4: de ni snyan par grags shing legs te /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-5: chu ni gzigs par dbyung bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba btab bo //
K10D0314_H0318:257b-7: klu mo brgyad po 'di dag ste /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-10: mthong mo zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-11: grang mo zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-12: khur drang mo zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-13: lab 'thor ma zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-14: sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-15: dri za mo zhes bya ba dag gis kyang gnas brtan chen po'i rkang pa la phyag btsal te /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-16: thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rab tu gus pas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0314_H0318:257b-18: nags de ni gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i gnas yin te /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-19: bdag cag kyang nye gnas bgyid la gzhan dag kyang gzung du gsol //
K10D0314_H0318:257b-20: de ni snyan par grags shing legs te chu ni
K10D0314_H0318:257b-21: gzigs par dbyung bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba btab
K10D0314_H0318:257b-22: pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong chen pos cang mi smra bar dang du blangs so //
K10D0314_H0318:257b-24: lha ma yin dang; nam mkha' lding dang /
K10D0314_H0318:257b-27: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag gis
K10D0314_H0318:257b-28: tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong chen pos cang mi
K10D0314_H0318:258a-0: smra ba dang du blangs par rig @258a *//
K10D0314_H0318:258a-1: nas dga' mgu yi rangs par gyur to //
K10D0314_H0318:258a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong chen pos
K10D0314_H0318:258a-3: ston pa'i zhal du lta ba mthong nas ta ma
K10D0314_H0318:258a-4: sa'i nags su song ste; phyin nas bla gab med
K10D0314_H0318:258a-6: gandi'i sgra des dzambu'i gling khyab par sgra grags par
K10D0314_H0318:258a-7: gyur pa na dge slong dag gis sgra thos te
K10D0314_H0318:258a-8: sems pa la zhugs pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-9: sgra 'di ni mun gyi nags nas byung ngo snyam mo //
K10D0314_H0318:258a-10: de'ang sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gi bzhugs gnas /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-11: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis gnas bcas pa /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-12: 'dod chags dang bral ba dag dang drang srong dag
K10D0314_H0318:258a-13: gis gnas su gyur pa yin la da ltar yang
K10D0314_H0318:258a-14: de kho na btsun pa rab mthong chen po yin
K10D0314_H0318:258a-15: par go zhing shes nas mthong ste /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-16: dag bcom pa khri brgyad stong snyed kyis mun gyi nags su phyin te dbyar gyi gnas pa'ang bcas /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-17: tshangs pa lha'i dbang po dang /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-18: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-19: sen mo khyer te 'ongs nas dbu skra dang /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-20: sen mo'i mchod rten zhig bzhengs su gsol /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-21: gtsug lag khang zhig kyang brtsigs /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-22: rdo rje'i gtsug lag khang du mtshan gsol /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-23: mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-24: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis kyang so so nas gtsug lag khang re re bzhengs su gsol /
K10D0314_H0318:258a-25: lo dang po la lha rnams kyis gnas bcas /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-0: @258b lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang gi la
K10D0314_H0318:258b-1: gnas lo gcig gi chos gos la sogs pa yo
K10D0314_H0318:258b-3: lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis dge slong re re
K10D0314_H0318:258b-4: zhing ras yug re re chos gos kyi rgyu'ang phul
K10D0314_H0318:258b-5: / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong chen
K10D0314_H0318:258b-6: po gnas khang du lha'i 'khor gyis bskor te gnas
K10D0314_H0318:258b-7: bcas pa na 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0314_H0318:258b-8: gnas bcas pa 'di yun ring gnas bcas par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-9: mi'i grong khyer gnas bca' ba'i phyir rgyal rigs rtsub
K10D0314_H0318:258b-10: po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mi rnams la
K10D0314_H0318:258b-11: chos bstan pas yid rab tu dga' zhing /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-13: rgyal po chen po rtsub pos dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-14: gzhan dag kyang dad par gyur te /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-15: phug lnga brgya'i las kyang byas /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-16: drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa lnga brgya'ang rab tu byung ste /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-17: dgra bcom pa mngon du byas /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-18: gnas de na bram ze smra ba la mkhas pa zhig yod pa de las rgyal bar gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-19: btul nas rab tu byung ste; des kyang dgra bcom
K10D0314_H0318:258b-20: pa mngon du byas te ta ma sa'i nags na
K10D0314_H0318:258b-21: tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong chen po la sogs
K10D0314_H0318:258b-22: pa dgra bcom pa khri brgyad snyed gnas bcas so
K10D0314_H0318:258b-23: zhes / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-25: grong khyer kun tu grags par gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:258b-26: rgyal po rtsub po la sogs pa mi rnams ni
K10D0314_H0318:258b-27: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi slad du nyin re bzhin
K10D0314_H0318:259a-1: ma yin pa dag ni de bzhin du zhun mar 'bul bar byed /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-4: dang bas mgu zhing rangs pas legs par las dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-6: de bzhin du klu dag gis dga' ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-7: mgu bas tha dad pa'i bye brag bco brgyad kyi bza' ba dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-8: bca' ba sbyar ba phul lo //
K10D0314_H0318:259a-10: 'di ltar skye dgu'i lus can sems bskyed pa /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-14: kun dga' ra ba zhig kyang byas te /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-15: de dag tu me tog gi shing dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-16: 'bras bu'i shing mdzes pa 'di dag ste /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-23: me tog tsam pa ka'i shing dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-30: chu shing la sogs pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-31: me tog ma li ka dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-33: dza hi ka la sogs pa mdzes pa sna tshogs
K10D0314_H0318:259a-34: dge slong bde bar gnas pa dge ba'i phyogs byed
K10D0314_H0318:259a-35: pa dang mthun pa zhig kyang byas te dge 'dun
K10D0314_H0318:259a-36: la phul lo // de nas dge slong dag the
K10D0314_H0318:259a-37: tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs
K10D0314_H0318:259a-38: rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10D0314_H0318:259a-40: tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong gis las ci bgyid
K10D0314_H0318:259b-0: na las gang @259b yang rnam par smin pa phyug
K10D0314_H0318:259b-1: cing nor mang la longs spyod dang ldan pa'i rigs
K10D0314_H0318:259b-2: su skyes / gzugs mdzes shing lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-3: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-4: bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa shes par 'chal lags so zhes zhus pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-7: 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na yang
K10D0314_H0318:259b-8: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes
K10D0314_H0318:259b-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-15: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-17: rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi khab na bzhugs te /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-18: dus de'i tshe zhal zhal mkhan gyi rigs las phyug
K10D0314_H0318:259b-19: pa ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig gis rnam
K10D0314_H0318:259b-20: par gzigs kyi slad du gtsug lag khang brtsigs te
K10D0314_H0318:259b-22: 'bras bu'i shing legs par btsugs te /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-23: kun tu dri bsung gi ngad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur te phul /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-24: ston pa de nyid kyi bstan pa la'ang rab tu byung /
K10D0314_H0318:259b-25: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
K10D0314_H0318:259b-26: mya ngan las 'das nas sku gdung gi mchod rten
K10D0314_H0318:259b-27: gyi rmang gi 'og tu rin po che'i rdo ring
K10D0314_H0318:259b-29: zhal zhal mkhan gyi rigs las rab tu byung ba
K10D0314_H0318:259b-30: de'i 'khor mang po'ang rjes su yi rang zhing mos
K10D0314_H0318:260a-1: ston pa la mos par gyur pa de bzhin bdag cag kyang dad cing mos par bgyid de /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-2: ston pa'i bka' bzhin du bgyid cing mnyes par bgyid
K10D0314_H0318:260a-3: la mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces smon lam
K10D0314_H0318:260a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na zhal zhal mkhan gang yin
K10D0314_H0318:260a-7: pa de ni tshe dang ldan pa rab mthong chen
K10D0314_H0318:260a-9: skye dgu'i lus can de dag ni da ltar gyi lha dang mi 'di dag yin te /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-10: da ltar yang 'dul bar byed pa yin no //
K10D0314_H0318:260a-12: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-13: de'i mkhan po ni lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-14: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin te /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-15: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-16: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du
K10D0314_H0318:260a-17: bdag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya
K10D0314_H0318:260a-18: thub pa'i bstan pa la lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-19: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K10D0314_H0318:260a-20: des na da ltar lha dang /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-21: mis mchod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
K10D0314_H0318:260a-22: de lta bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag
K10D0314_H0318:260a-23: pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu gnag
K10D0314_H0318:260a-24: go / rab tu dkar ba las ni dkar ba'o //
K10D0314_H0318:260a-25: 'dres pa la ni 'dres pa'o; ;de bas na /
K10D0314_H0318:260a-29: rab tu dkar ba dag la spyad par bya ste /
K10D0314_H0318:260b-0: de bzhin du bslab par gyis @260b shig ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0314_H0318:260b-1: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa yid la byed de mngon par dga'o //
K10D0314_H0318:260b-2: mun gyi nags tshal gyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0314_H0318:260b-3: byang phyogs rgyud kyi phreng ba'i mdo khri ba'i nang
K10D0314_H0318:260b-4: nas yul za lendra'i byang phyogs kyi mtshams kyi ri
